'''Flower-Feather Clan "Warning" Balloon''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Flower-Feather Clan "Warning" Balloon is obtainable from a Remarkable Chest in [[Natlan]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a Remarkable Chest in the northwest corner of [[Core of Chu'ulel|Core of Chu'ulel: Interior]] (B2).
